mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CM_USER_ACCESS_LOG VALUES ( SEQ_USER_ACCESS_LOG.NEXTVAL, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NULL, SYSDATE, #{URL, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqParams, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logIp, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{modId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{execTime} )

MERGE INTO CM_USER_ACCESS_LOG_ACTION_MAP USING DUAL ON (URL = #{URL, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET ACTION_NAME = #{actionName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTION_GUBUN_CD = #{actionGubunCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERSONAL_YN = #{personalYN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOD_ID = #{modId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOD_DATE = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( URL, ACTION_NAME, ACTION_GUBUN_CD, PERSONAL_YN, REG_ID, REG_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE ) VALUES ( #{URL, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actionName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actionGubunCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalYN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{modId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT URL, ACTION_NAME, ACTION_GUBUN_CD, PERSONAL_YN FROM CM_USER_ACCESS_LOG_ACTION_MAP WHERE URL = #{URL}

SELECT A.*, B.MOD_ID FROM ( SELECT Nvl(SubStr(URL, InStr(URL, '/', 1, 3)+1, InStr(URL, '/', 1, 4)-InStr(URL, '/', 1, 3)-1), 'etc') TITLE, SubStr(URL, Decode(InStr(URL, '/', 1, 4)+1, 1, InStr(URL, '/', 1, 3)+1, InStr(URL, '/', 1, 4)+1), Length(URL)) CONTENT, URL FROM CM_USER_ACCESS_LOG GROUP BY Nvl(SubStr(URL, InStr(URL, '/', 1, 3)+1, InStr(URL, '/', 1, 4)-InStr(URL, '/', 1, 3)-1), 'etc'), SubStr(URL, Decode(InStr(URL, '/', 1, 4)+1, 1, InStr(URL, '/', 1, 3)+1, InStr(URL, '/', 1, 4)+1), Length(URL)), URL ORDER BY 1, 2 ) A, CM_USER_ACCESS_LOG_ACTION_MAP B WHERE A.URL = B.URL(+)
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT URL) FROM CM_USER_ACCESS_LOG WHERE URL LIKE '%'||#{url}||'%'
